DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy AGN-214868 patient idiopathic overactive bladder ( IOAB ) urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study AGN-214868 Patients With Idiopathic Overactive Bladder Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: If female , must nonreproductive potential If male , must agree use acceptable contraception Symptoms overactive bladder urinary urgency incontinence Inadequate response limit side effect anticholinergic treatment OAB Overactive bladder cause neurological condition ( eg , spinal cord injury , multiple sclerosis ) History bladder surgery Treatment botulinum toxin therapy serotype nonurological condition within prior 12 week Previous treatment botulinum toxin therapy serotype urological condition
